content.en: Integrated Process Optimization: Researchers are exploring how to combine the strengths of heuristics and optimization algorithms in solving process synthesis and operations problems. They are using analytical investigations to understand the behavior of these algorithms. By integrating different algorithms and concepts, such as reactor network synthesis and mass exchange network concepts, they are able to simultaneously synthesize reaction, mixing, and separation in chemical process flowsheets. These algorithms are also being used to improve reactor network synthesis for complex reaction systems and to design optimal chemical reactor networks. Additionally, researchers are using stochastic optimization and genetic technology to explore design options and improve decision-making in reactor network synthesis.
content.da: Integreret procesoptimering: Forskere undersøger, hvordan man kan kombinere styrkerne ved heuristikker og optimeringsalgoritmer til at løse problemer inden for procesteknik og driftsstyring. De anvender analytiske undersøgelser for at forstå disse algoritmers adfærd. Ved at integrere forskellige algoritmer og begreber, såsom reaktornetværkssyntese og masseudvekslingsnetværk, er de i stand til samtidig at syntetisere reaktion, blanding og separation i kemiske procesflowskemaer. Disse algoritmer bruges også til at forbedre reaktornetværkssyntese for komplekse reaktionssystemer og til at designe optimale kemiske reaktornetværk. Derudover bruger forskere stokastisk optimering og genetisk teknologi til at undersøge designmuligheder og forbedre beslutningstagning i reaktornetværkssyntese.
